howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Select from dozens of expertly-crafted learning paths tailored to your goals.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Progress through interactive lessons, hands-on exercises, and real-world projects.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Complete assessments and earn verifiable certificates to showcase your achievements.

whyJoin.title: Why Join Zporta Academy?
whyJoin.securePrivateDesc: Industry-standard encryption protects your data and learning history.
whyJoin.vibrantCommunityDesc: Connect with thousands of learners, discuss challenges, and share breakthroughs.
whyJoin.verifiedCertificatesDesc: Earn certificates recognized across the industry to validate your skills.
whyJoin.learnAtYourPaceDesc: Study whenever you want, access all content immediately, never expire.

explore.title: Explore Knowledge
explore.subtitle: Discover a universe of interactive courses and expert-led paths designed to take you from beginner to pro.
explore.personalizedDiscoveryDesc: Our AI recommends content based on your unique learning style and goals.
explore.interactiveLearningDesc: Don't just watchâ€”do. Hands-on exercises built into every lesson.
explore.curatedPathsDesc: Follow step-by-step roadmaps crafted by industry veterans.

certificates.title: Earn Certificates
certificates.subtitle: Validate your expertise. Earn verified credentials that you can showcase on LinkedIn and your resume.
certificates.verifiedCredentialsDesc: Tamper-proof digital certificates hosted on the blockchain.
certificates.resumeReadyDesc: One-click sharing to LinkedIn and digital portfolios.
certificates.projectBasedDesc: Certificates are awarded for building real projects, not just watching videos.

mentorship.title: Find Your Mentor
mentorship.subtitle: Accelerate your growth with 1-on-1 guidance from industry experts who have been where you want to go.
mentorship.expertGuidanceDesc: Get unstuck faster with direct access to senior professionals.
mentorship.careerRoadmappingDesc: Build a personalized plan to reach your dream job.
mentorship.codeReviewsDesc: Get detailed feedback on your projects to improve code quality.

studyTrack.title: Study & Track
studyTrack.subtitle: Turn consistency into your superpower. Track every minute of learning and visualize your progress.
studyTrack.smartAnalyticsDesc: Visualize your learning patterns to optimize your study time.
studyTrack.dailyStreaksDesc: Build a powerful habit with gamified daily goals.
studyTrack.focusTimerDesc: Built-in Pomodoro timer to keep you in the flow state.

community.title: Join the Community
community.subtitle: You don't have to learn alone. Connect with thousands of peers, share your journey, and grow together.
community.globalNetworkDesc: Connect with learners and professionals from over 50 countries.
community.peerSupportDesc: Get help with bugs, share resources, and find study buddies.
community.showcaseWorkDesc: Share your portfolio and get constructive feedback.

compareSkills.title: Benchmark Your Skills
compareSkills.subtitle: See where you stand. Take adaptive assessments to identify gaps and measure your growth against the industry.
compareSkills.adaptiveQuizzesDesc: Questions that adapt to your skill level for accurate assessment.
compareSkills.globalPercentilesDesc: See how you rank compared to thousands of other developers.
compareSkills.skillRadarDesc: Visualize your strengths and weaknesses across different technologies.

progress.title: Visualize Progress
progress.subtitle: Data-driven learning. Get deep insights into your learning velocity, retention, and mastery.
progress.learningVelocityDesc: Track how fast you are mastering new concepts over time.
progress.retentionTrackingDesc: Spaced repetition algorithms ensure you never forget what you learn.
progress.goalSettingDesc: Set custom milestones and let us help you stay on track.

fullStack.description: Complete curriculum from HTML/CSS fundamentals through backend APIs and deployment. 60+ hours of content.
